document.full_text: iran plans to build "four to five" nuclear research reactors and will continue to enrich uranium to provide their fuel, a nuclear official said on monday despite western pressure on tehran to curb atomic work.
document.title: iran to build new nuclear research reactors-report
lines_and_colors: iran plans to build "four to five" nuclear research reactors and will continue to enrich uranium to provide their fuel, a nuclear official said on monday despite western pressure on tehran to curb atomic work.
